required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Adjuvant Dabrafenib and Trametinib Treatment in Patients With Completely Resected High-risk Stage III Melanoma.
clinical_study.official_title: A Real-life Study to Evaluate the Use of Adjuvant Treatment With Dabrafenib and Trametinib in Routine Practice in Patients With Completely Resected High-risk Stage III Melanoma

brief_summary.textblock: Non-interventional (observational) cohort prospective real life study with primary and secondary data collection from patients on adjuvant treatment with dabrafenib + trametinib in patients with completely resected high-risk stage III (stage IIIA [lymph node > 1mm], IIIB, IIIC and IIID according to AJCC 8th edition) melanoma in Turkey.

detailed_description.textblock: The prospective registration of completely resected high-risk stage III melanoma patients treated with dabrafenib and trametinib in the adjuvant setting will be based on collaboration with centers of excellence on melanoma patients treatment. Pre-identified centers (up to 12) considered as the most advanced according to their knowledge and experience, will take part in the patients recruitment.

primary_outcome.description: RFS is the length of time after primary treatment for a cancer ends that the patient survives without any signs or symptoms of that cancer.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: until end of treatment or permanent treatment discontinuation
secondary_outcome.description: Total duration of treatment defined as median time on adjuvant dabrafenib + trametinib treatment (from start to end of treatment/permanent treatment discontinuation).
Collection of number of patients on treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of permanent study drug discontinuation
secondary_outcome.description: Rate of permanent study drug discontinuation due to any reason will be collected

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of permanent drug discontinuation due to pyrexia and other AEs
secondary_outcome.description: Rate of permanent drug discontinuation due to pyrexia and other AEs will be collected

secondary_outcome.measure: incidence and severity of Adverse Events (AEs)
secondary_outcome.description: Collection of incidence and severity of Adverse Events

secondary_outcome.measure: procedures of the management of Adverse Events (AEs)
secondary_outcome.description: Collection of procedures of the management of Adverse Events (AEs)
death, relapse, AEs, withdrawal of consent, other

secondary_outcome.measure: Average dose of dabrafenib and trametinib used during the treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Average dose of dabrafenib and trametinib used during the treatment including dose reductions.

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients with dabrafenib and trametinib dose reduction during treatment
secondary_outcome.description: collection of the proportion of patients with dabrafenib and trametinib dose reduction during treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Reason for dabrafenib and trametinib dose reduction
secondary_outcome.description: Collection of the reason for dabrafenib and trametinib dose reduction
Collection of the time since surgery
Collection of the type of relapse: local, regional or distant

arm_group.description: patients on adjuvant treatment with dabrafenib + trametinib

intervention.description: There is no treatment allocation. Patients administered dabrafenib by prescription that have started before inclusion of the patient into the study will be enrolled.
There is no treatment allocation. Patients administered trametinib by prescription that have started before inclusion of the patient into the study will be enrolled.

study_pop.textblock: Completely resected high-risk stage III melanoma patients treated with dabrafenib and trametinib in the adjuvant setting
